General.Name: Cofco Biochemical Anhui Co Ltd
General.Description: COFCO Biotechnology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the processing and production of biochemical products in China. The company offers edible corn, special, waxy corn, and modified waxy corn starch; feed products, such as corn gluten meal, sprayed corn husk, corn germ meal, DDGS, fertilizer raw materials and glutamic acid residue; sweeteners comprising special syrup for frozen dough, compound fructose powder, maltodextrin, and fructose and glucose syrups; edible alcohol and fuel ethanol; and monosodium glutamate, anhydrous citric acid, potassium citrate, polylactic acid, phytosterols, and natural vitamin E. The company was formerly known as COFCO Biochemical (Anhui) Co., Ltd. and changed its name to COFCO Biotechnology Co., Ltd. in September 2019. COFCO Biotechnology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Bengbu, China.
